name: Zynexa
description: Zynexa is a privacy focused operating system for Web3 that allows users to create identities, communicate, and store data without relying on centralized servers. All sensitive operations happen locally on the device, including key generation, encryption, and message handling. The platform includes encrypted messaging, private storage, zk powered identity, and a verifiable browser that lets users interact with the internet in a transparent and trustless way. The purpose of Zynexa is to give users full control of their information, prevent data leakage, and provide a secure environment for on chain activity and Web3 interactions.
